Package CS506Team25.Card_Engine.websocket

Class GameWebsocketController

java.lang.Object
CS506Team25.Card_Engine.websocket.GameWebsocketController
@Controller public class GameWebsocketController extends Object
API for websockets which allow live updates to multiple users

  • Method Details

    • handleSubscribingToEuchreGame

      @SubscribeMapping("/games/euchre/{gameID}") @SendTo("/topic/games/euchre/{gameID}") public CS506Team25.Card_Engine.websocket.LobbyMessage handleSubscribingToEuchreGame(@DestinationVariable int gameID)
      Message that is sent when player subscribes to an Euchre game.
      Parameters:
      gameID - gameID you're joining
      Returns:
      A JSON with information about the lobby if game isn't ready to start see LobbyMessage for format. If game is ready to start returns a JSON with info about the game see GameMessage for format. Otherwise, if the game couldn't be found

    • voteStart

      @MessageMapping("/games/euchre/{gameID}/vote-start") @SendTo("/topic/games/euchre/{gameID}") public CS506Team25.Card_Engine.websocket.LobbyMessage voteStart(@DestinationVariable int gameID, @Payload int userID)
      Parameters:
      gameID - ID of current lobby
      userID - Voting user's ID
      Returns:
      A JSON with information about the lobby if game isn't ready to start see LobbyMessage for format. If game is ready to start returns a JSON with info about the game see GameMessage for format. Otherwise, if the vote's unable to be changed return null

    • voteNotToStart

      @MessageMapping("/games/euchre/{gameID}/vote-not-to-start") @SendTo("/topic/games/euchre/{gameID}") public CS506Team25.Card_Engine.websocket.LobbyMessage voteNotToStart(@DestinationVariable int gameID, int userID)
      Parameters:
      gameID - ID of current lobby
      userID - Voting user's ID
      Returns:
      A JSON with information about the lobby if game isn't ready to start see LobbyMessage for format. If game is ready to start returns a JSON with info about the game see GameMessage for format. Otherwise, if the vote's unable to be changed return null

    • makeMove

      @MessageMapping("/games/euchre/{gameID}/{userID}/make-move") @SendTo("/topic/games/euchre/{gameID}") public CS506Team25.Card_Engine.websocket.GameMessage makeMove(@DestinationVariable int gameID, @DestinationVariable int userID, String move)
      Parameters:
      gameID - ID of current game
      userID - ID of the user trying to make a move
      move - The move being made, see options in GameMessage to know which moves can be made
      Returns:
      A JSON of the updated game state if move successfully made, see GameMessage for format Otherwise if game could not be found or if move could not be made, return null

    • getHand

      @MessageMapping("/games/euchre/{gameID}/{userID}/request-hand") @SendToUser("/queue/{gameID}/hand") public LinkedHashMap<CS506Team25.Card_Engine.Card,Boolean> getHand(@DestinationVariable int gameID, @DestinationVariable int userID)
      Endpoint that privately sends a player their hand
      Parameters:
      gameID - ID of current lobby
      userID - ID of player that is requesting hand
      Returns:
      A JSON representing the players cards in hand, see Player.hand for format, coupled with a boolean value which is true if the card is currently playable else return null if game or player in game couldn't be found

    • sendBotMove

      public void sendBotMove(CS506Team25.Card_Engine.Game game)
      Internal message to handle when a bot is making a move
      Parameters:
      game - The game the bot is in.

    • handleException

      @MessageExceptionHandler @SendToUser(value="/queue/games/euchre/errors", broadcast=false) public Map<String,String> handleException(Throwable exception)
      Handles any exceptions occurring here; sends the error message to the originating client

    • waitUntilGameWantsInput

      public void waitUntilGameWantsInput(CS506Team25.Card_Engine.Game game)
      Helper method to make sure there isn't de-sync between a changing game and a sent out message
      Parameters:
      game - the game that is to be waited on
